extendedInfo.description: SteamGifts.com is a site where you can win free Steam gifts, or create a giveaway to share with your friends or online gaming community.Using a fast, easy and clean interface, this SteamGifts app will get you into the giveaways you want as quick as possible, and also allows you to use most of SteamGifts.com's other great features!Get to the games you want by filtering out the ones you already have, by searching specifically by their names, or even by manually entering the giveaway's 5 digit code. To make the most out of this app, be sure to use the options menu on your phone to unlock most of the app's functionalities on each page, and also tune the app settings to your likes.If you already have a Steam account, start off by registering on the official SteamGifts website - http://www.steamgifts.com - and you can immediately start entering giveaways with your newly rewarded points.Disclaimer: This app is in no way affiliated with Valve Corporation.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: The only problem I have with it is that it hasn\'t updated the amount I\'ve given away. I\'ve given away a little over $100 but it still says $30. I\'ve tried syncing my profile but it does nothing.
reviews.author: Miguel Beltran

reviews.title: Great and getting better!
reviews.comment: Lots of controls here compared to the other app. Loads quickly, and it gives me all the info I want succinctly. Being able to get to the steam description of a game from its banner is very nice touch. Thanks!
reviews.author: Michael McClung

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: No giveaways matching your criteria. What should I do? Please tell me...
reviews.author: AlienGaming RO

reviews.title: The best steam gifts app
reviews.comment: Found a bug: won\'t let me comment on giveaways I create. Maybe it\'s only the group ones. No publics.  It does everything, even lets me comment. I wish for only one further feature. Allow for landscape orientation. I often use my phone for media, so to me this would make it easier.  Also wish I could reply to Tyler with the \"does not work\". If steam gifts is trying to sync but your profile is not public and fails, the app gives you nothing. Something that could definitely be improved to avoid confusion.
reviews.author: Matty Matt

reviews.title: Very handy!
reviews.comment: I\'m really enjoying this app and use it daily. Suggestions for improvement: exclusion and Entered list sorted by name and time left respectively; wishlist highlighting; bug when removing a title from the exclusion list makes others from the list show up, making you have to exclude again and causes duplicate entries; and most of all a push/background or configurable auto refresh option (!!), along with notifications (such as new giveaways with games on your wishlist) . Thanks!
reviews.author: Cody Wells

reviews.title: Nice app!
reviews.comment: Great app for SG. Some features even better then the site. Few feature requests: option to filter out DLC of missing base games, sort feature for newest items first (like an RSS feed), link givers name to their profile for easier fake giveaway checking. Bugs: only showing first 25 of the games on my wishlist. App locks up waiting for a request if the server is slow.
reviews.author: Matt Conte

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: This stupid app refuses to let me sign in. Worst app ever waste of time, keeps telling me to put in a security pass code when my loggings right, don\'t bother with this app waste of space!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jessica silva

reviews.title: Better than the alternative
reviews.comment: It can be a little buggy at times, randomly throwing the \"No giveaways matching your criteria\" error.  That being said, it works fine for the most part and it does what it says. Also, the filter option is very useful.
reviews.author: Yaser Hani

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It\'s an awesome app,works great plus when i,m on mobile data i can choose not to download images.
reviews.author: soky srm

reviews.title: a poor problem
reviews.comment: cant push the button after entering login security code, so its impossible to even try the app, real shame. Im sure it would be a great app if i could use it though.
reviews.author: Jason DeSanto

reviews.title: Use it every day.
reviews.comment: Very useful and works a charm  :)  Thanks dev!
reviews.author: Osmo sys

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Pretty good, needs a few filtering options like not showing giveaways you can\'t enter (not enough points, missing base game, etc) and maybe a popup saying why the entry failed if long pressing from the list view
reviews.author: Joe Miller

reviews.title: Landscape support?
reviews.comment: Please enable landscape support, it is useful for 10\" tablets.
reviews.author: Adrian Onose

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Easy to use and can enter anytime
reviews.author: L YS

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: All you need when you wanna go on Steamgifts on your mobile. Nice and simple layout
reviews.author: Kieran Kaelin

reviews.title: Wat the hell
reviews.comment: It wont let me do giveaways thing nothong comes up so uninstalling
reviews.author: Dylan Patterson

reviews.title: Figured it out
reviews.comment: You have to go online and log into the actual website in order to make an account before this app works! You\'re welcome people.
reviews.author: Jesse Duncan

reviews.title: Want to know
reviews.comment: Excuse me sir, when i open the apps it say no one criteria match blablablba  It happens to me eventough i checked all criteria
reviews.author: Endy Wibowo

reviews.title: Sign up to the website
reviews.comment: For everyone that Cant see anything on the menus you have to go on the website and sign up and then it works
reviews.author: Dan v

reviews.title: yeah, no...
reviews.comment: \'no games match your search criteria\', all day, erryday.
reviews.author: A Google User
